Title: Inside the Box
Plot: Three masked bandits steal a safe-deposit box from a Las Vegas bank in a daring daytime heist. Catherine follows the evidence to the casino owner, who is like a father to her. Grissom's hearing gets progressively worse and he asks Doc Robbins for help.
GuestStars: Michael Shamus Wiles, David Selburg, Emilio Rivera, Christie Lynn Smith, Scott DeFoe, Lawrence McNeal III, Jimmy Jax Pinchak
